bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with leng lou chuang 冷漏瘡 , cold-leakage sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry lou lan zi 漏籃子 quotes Ren zhai zhi zhi fang 仁齋直指方 : 風漏瘡年久者，復其元陽，當用漏籃子輩， 加減用之。如不當用而輕用之，又恐熱氣乘虛變移結核，而為害尤甚也 , “For wind-leakage sores that have lasted for years, to restore the original yang [qi] one must resort to items like lou lan zi . The amounts may vary. If it is used haphazardly where it must not be used, the heat qi may avail itself of the depletion and form nodular kernels, resulting in very serious harm”.
